Chris Dibbern

Chris' Blog

I am just some guy; one in a million.
If you're here, you're probably a friend who got bored... >>>
Well, friend - You can only know someone, through what they create, so well.
Call me up! Let's go have a coffee! >>>
No? Not feeling social? That's okay, too - some other time. Anyway, feel free to peruse my wildly random musings, poetry, and a few, exotic hobby projects. Maybe check out my brand-new FOL language. Not your sort of hobby? How about some poetry inspired by random friends, dreams, and so forth?
Thanks for stopping by. Enjoy!

Coastline

Walking along the coastline,
with this warm and gentle sunshine,
a breeze tickles through her hair,
her son whistles a song on the air.

Posted: 2014-04-19 15:21:00 -0500 | Read the full post

First post!

Rather than spam everyone on Facebook, I figure a blog is a much better way to express myself. Fortunately, github had the easy remedy, this time: simply push html (or Jekyll) to a gh-pages branch, and watch your blog show up at username.github.io/project. Pretty cool!

Posted: 2014-04-19 13:44:49 -0500 | Read the full post

About

I am a programmer and graduate student at the University of Iowa. My interests include God, friends, service, human languages, designing computer languages, logic, fitness, nature and outdoor adventures, and capturing all of the above in writing and pictures.
